title: Did George Clooney say hello to Trump and talk about Hollywood Elite?
subtitle: In late 2020, the world's famous actor and director was quoted as "the man who takes a golden shower" by the outgoing president.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: George Clooney once launched a campaign against Donald Trump, describing the humble background of the actor, accusing Trump of hypocrisy and saying, "You."
